summary: syntax coloring for critcl. extend tcl.vim
name: tcl_critcl.vim
description:
c-syntax for blocks of c-code in tcl definitions.

    Adds critcl syntax to tcl.vim (vimscript #1603)
install_details:
Place in ~/.vim/syntax/

    Activated by uncommenting the option at the top of the tcl.vim file.
